verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> in a <S%H4236>vision,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H87>Abram:<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am thy <S%H4043>shield,<s%> and thy <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H7939>reward.<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> wilt thou <S%H5414>give<s%> me, seeing <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6185>childless,<s%> and the <S%H1121>steward<s%> <S%H4943><s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus?<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> to me thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2233>seed:<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> one <S%H1121>born<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> is mine <S%H3423>heir.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be thine <S%H3423>heir;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> he <S%H834>that<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of thine own <S%H4480>bowels<s%> <S%H4578><s%> shall be thine <S%H3423>heir.<s%>

And he brought him <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5027>Look<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5608>tell<s%> the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5608>number<s%> them: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3541>So<s%> shall thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H1961>be.<s%>
And he <S%H539>believed<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and he <S%H2803>counted<s%> it to him for <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> thee out of <S%H4480>Ur<s%> <S%H218><s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> it.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H4100>whereby<s%> shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> I shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> it?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H3947>Take<s%> me an <S%H5697>heifer<s%> of three years <S%H8027>old,<s%> and a she <S%H5795>goat<s%> of three years <S%H8027>old,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> of three years <S%H8027>old,<s%> and a <S%H8449>turtledove,<s%> and a young <S%H1469>pigeon.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> unto <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these,<s%> and <S%H1334>divided<s%> them in the <S%H8432>midst,<s%> and <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H1335>piece<s%> one <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H7453>another:<s%> but the <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H1334>divided<s%> he <S%H3808>not.<s%>
And when the <S%H5861>fowls<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6297>carcasses,<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> drove them <S%H5380>away.<s%> <S%H853><s%>

And when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was going <S%H935>down,<s%> a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H87>Abram;<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> a <S%H367>horror<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2825>darkness<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram,<s%> Know of a <S%H3045>surety<s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> that is <S%H3808>not<s%> theirs, and shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> them; and they shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%>

And <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they shall <S%H5647>serve,<s%> will <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H1777>judge:<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall they come <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7399>substance.<s%>
And <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> in <S%H7965>peace;<s%> thou shalt be <S%H6912>buried<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> old <S%H7872>age.<s%>

But in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> they shall come hither <S%H7725>again:<s%> <S%H2008><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5704>yet<s%> <S%H2008><s%> <S%H8003>full.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that, when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> went <S%H935>down,<s%> and it <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5939>dark,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H6227>smoking<s%> <S%H8574>furnace,<s%> and a <S%H784>burning<s%> <S%H3940>lamp<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1506>pieces.<s%>

In the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> from the <S%H4480>river<s%> <S%H5104><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> Euphrates: <S%H6578><s%>
<S%H853><s%> The <S%H7017>Kenites,<s%> and the <S%H7074>Kenizzites,<s%> and the <S%H6935>Kadmonites,<s%>
And the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H7497>Rephaims,<s%>
And the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites.<s%>
